name: Glacier
tagline: Glacier is a type annotation extension to Java that enforces transitive class immutability.
body:
### Glacier helps keep your immutable data immutable.

### Replication package
[Replication Package](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mcoblenz/Glacier/master/ReplicationPackage.zip)
